text: École supérieure d'informatique, électronique, automatique (ESIEA) is a graduate engineering school in France. It is in a campus of Ivry-sur-Seine, close to the one of the Institut Polytechnique des Sciences Avancées.ESIEA, l’école qui implique ses anciens élèves == Research labs == Research activities at ESIEA relate to the following topics: * Information & Systems Security * Digital Interactions * Health and handicap == References == == Further reading == * Official website Category:Technical colleges and universities in Paris Category:1958 establishments in Europe Category:1950s establishments in France
title: ESIEA (university)
